body:
Adds Apple versions of libelf, libdwarf, and some system libraries it looks like dyninst needs to build.

Issues that need to be addressed:

* what version of `elf` does this provide? I can't tell what makes an ELF implementation `elf@0` versus `elf@1`.

* will making this package a provider of `libdwarf` break anything?
title: apple-dtrace: new package
